name: cartographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the making or drawing of maps: digital maps and other cartographic data a cartographic survey of the area Cook used the latest cartographical equipment to pinpoint and map the Pacific Islands.
More examplesFewer examplesIn an essay on American cartographic history, she describes how the English and French engaged in competitive mapmaking.He is a cartographic specialist at the Library of Congress.The exhibition presents more than 100 of the world's greatest cartographic treasures including ancient Babylonian and Roman maps.The phone box marks the cartographical centre of Britain.
